Package mmb.GL

Class RenderCtx

  • java.lang.Object
    • mmb.GL.RenderCtx
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleCtx
    public abstract class RenderCtx
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Author:
    oskar Provides an interface for rendering half-vector 2D graphics

        Mutates the input object to be a transform used by this context
        Parameters:
        tf -
        Returns:

      • render

        public abstract void render()
        Runs the rendering magic. The context must be already set

      • setup

        public abstract void setup()
        Sets up the rendering context. This includes:
        • loading in shaders
        • loading in texture atlases
        • creating VBOs and VAOs

      • close

        public abstract void close()
        Destroys this rendering context
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
